title: Store button disappeared after patch 7.23???
body: So i was hyped to play the new champ zoe, i got back from school, league starts patching and after it patched completely i relogged.The store button next to loot was disappeared.I restarted my pc but it still doesn't show. Anyone that could help me? :D (also tried using the unlock button)

replies.body: Hey guys, there may have been some hiccups due to maintenance and server issues today.  Give it a little bit, and you should be able to access the store without issue if not already.
I had to store button until league went offline at 9:30 PDT to have their maintenance. Now i don't have it....
Same thing happened to a friend of mine... ew {{champion:9}}

Same that happened to me too but idk how to solve it either
Feels bad man, i wanted to pop people like a balloon, but i guess i have to wait{{champion:61}}
